explanation:
code_hardening: Initialized the return value using the new def parameter with a safe fallback to an empty string when def is null; added a null check for context; marked locals as final where appropriate; ensured unexpected failures safely return the fallback.
resolve_compilation_errors: Updated the method signature to include String def; adjusted reflection metadata to use two String parameters; updated the argument array to pass both key and def; used fully qualified names for android.content.Context and java.lang.reflect.Method within the function.
exception_handling: Preserved rethrowing of IllegalArgumentException unchanged; modified the generic exception handling to return def (or empty string if def is null) without introducing new checked exceptions.
logic_customization: Switched the reflected call to android.os.SystemProperties.get(String, String); used def as both the initial and fallback return value; invoked the static method with a null receiver.
refactoring: Changed method visibility to private; updated Javadoc to document the def parameter and revised return semantics; removed redundant object creation (no new String(key)).
misc: Added concise comments/Javadoc reflecting new behavior; no new custom API calls beyond the reflected android.os.SystemProperties.get(String, String).
